title: Nielsen Media | MTS-3 | Gurgaon
content:
Education: B.E. from Tier 2 College 
Years of Experience: 8 year+
Current Compensation - 42.5 Fixed + 15K ESOPs (Vested over 4 years)
Date of the Offer: Nov 2024
Company: Nielsen Media
Title/Level: Member of Technical Staff -3
Location: Gurgaon (Hybrid)
Salary: 51 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: NA
Performance Bonus: 5.1 LPA
Gratuity+Medical: 1.2 LPA
Total comp : 57.3 LPA
Benefits: Term, Health and Accidental Insurance
